titles.title: To provide for the temporary suspension of duty on certain plastic web sheeting.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/10/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1999, the duty on certain plastic web sheeting.
